content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft nether_bricks, I need to move 4 nether_brick into the crafting grid. I will start by moving the first one from slot 35 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to move another nether_brick to slot 2, which is next to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to move another nether_brick to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to move another nether_brick to slot 5, which is next to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "chest_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the nether_bricks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
